body.name: MONDAY HAIRCARE Smooth Conditioner (Amazon Exclusive) 30oz for Frizzy, Coarse, and Curly Hair, Made from Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, & Vitamin E, All-Natural, 100% Recycled Bottles (887ml)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 35 mins
FREE pickup Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest pickup Friday, February 16. Order within 35 mins
features: SMOOTH CONDITIONER: This award-winning formula helps to add softness and shape to curly, wavy and frizzy hair types. It contains Coconut Oil, Shea Butter and Vitamin E to leave hair soft, shiny and frizz-free.

SALON-QUALITY: Our modern formulas are dermatologically tested, PH-balanced, and free from SLS, parabens and phthalates. We instead use natural ingredients such as shea butter, coconut oil, rice protein and vitamin E to nourish and restore.

AWARD-WINNING: Our range of Shampoo and Conditioner has 11 major beauty awards and counting, including a Cosmopolitan 2021 Holy Grail Beauty Award, Glamour 2021 Beauty Award, Cosmopolitan 2021 Beauty Award, and an InStyle 2022 Best Beauty Buy Award.

CERTIFIED CRUELTY-FREE: All of MONDAY’s products are approved as cruelty-free under the Leaping Bunny programme by Cruelty Free International. We’re also proud to be recognised by PETA as a brand that does not test on animals.

100% RECYCLABLE BOTTLES: Not only do our little pink bottles look great in your shower, they’re made from 100% recyclable plastic to help minimise carbon footprint and reduce landfill. A win for your hair and for the environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Purchased the set of smooth shampoo & conditioner, with what I’ll admit was not super high hopesImmediately upon very quickly receiving the two soundly packaged containers, I promptly hopped in the shower to give this fragrant set a go.I washed (twice) & conditioned (left in fir approx 5 mins) my long, thick, slightly textured nearly black with some naughty silver silver strands. I admit that I was shocked at how smooth my hair felt when in the shower...so much so that I rinsed for a very long time to make sure that all of the conditioner was cleanly out of my abundant hair.After rinsing well, I then pumped about an 1/8 teaspoon in to my palms and messaged it through the bottom 1/2 of my hair prior to towel drying as a leave in treatment...the scent seemed a bit powerful, yet I persisted with my testI allowed my hair to dry naturally because I’m lazy, tbh... & yes, I was more than pleased with the resultMy hair is soft & bouncy, & stupendously smooth, while the scent is clean & nicely fragrant, not overpowering at all. My hair feels clean & super healthyI am a convert. Goodbye Nexxus, it’s been nice knowing you, but there’s a new superior & less pricey set of haircare containers in my showerPS: I’ll circle back to share pix

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars great conditioner but came dirty and spilled
reviews.reviewText: Leaves hair soft. This did come dirty on the outside and spilled some in the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing quality at a fantastic price!!
reviews.reviewText: This is by far the best Shampoo and conditioner I have ever used! I saw Monday advertised on the Today show and decided to see if Amazon sells it, low and behold they do. It has a nice light scent and leaves my curls silky soft but not frizzy. I have always had an issue with frizzy hair and my hair being dry but not with these products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product leaves your hair nice and soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So happy to have found this product!
reviews.reviewText: I have white, no longer dyed, curly, frizzy, fly-away hair! Had been using another product (WEN) pomegranate, which has since been discontinued. Tried numerous replacements to no avail. My hair kept feeling coarser, which I attributed to my increasing age. But then, I found Monday! Behold! My hair is soft again! I have a layered cut, so all I do is wash and wear! For more defined curls, I spray a little “It’s a 10 “ leave in conditioner. My husband loves my hair again too. And I am back to getting compliments on my curls.(So far I have only used the conditioner as I am waiting to finish the bottle of shampoo I was using. I can hardly wait to try the shampoo and conditioner together. On a fixed income so I have to wait.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the hype
reviews.reviewText: I’ve heard of this conditioner a million times and decided to give it a shot, but every time I shower I find myself mixing this conditioner with my other one because it just doesn’t make my hair that soft!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Over all this is probably the best shampoo and conditioner combo I've ever used. First time ordering through Amazon and I was a little disappointed to have a broken bottle. Obviously it's still usable I just had to take the top off of the bottle but it would've been nice to not receive a broken product.
